item.title: Look Every Frame All at Once: Video-Ma$^2$mba for Efficient Long-form Video Understanding with Multi-Axis Gradient Checkpointing
item.description: Video-Ma²mba efficiently handles long videos by using State Space Models, achieving linear scaling in memory and time, and employing a novel Multi-Axis Gradient Checkpointing (MA-GC) for significant m…
